component.name: Master PDF Editor
component.summary: Master PDF Editor is a full solutions for work with PDF documents

ul.li: Edit PDF text and images, Mark and annotate, Merge and split.
JavaScript and Dynamic XFA form support.
Validation Forms and Calculate Values.
Adding a digital signature and Signing PDF Documents.
Fast and simple PDF forms fill out.
Added the functionality to compare documents.
Added the functionality to edit watermarks and backgrounds in the document.
Added the ability to insert default initials into documents.
Fixed bugs related to converting files to PDF/A-2. Now all files are converted to PDF/A-2 properly.
Added support for printing from the context menu on Windows.
Improved preview area in the Page Layout window.
Added automatic scrolling to the selected objects in the Object TreeView tab.
Fixed a bug with opening Certificate Manager on macOS starting from version 15.
Improvements to the watermark placed in the demo version.
A range of fixes made to the Print functionality.
Fixed a number of bugs in the user interface.
Fixed multiple issues related to operations of the View menu.
Bug fix for creating files in the wrong file format when using a virtual PDF printer.
Fixed incorrect comment and form importing in FDF format.
Fixed issues with displaying comments.
Resolved issues related to creating, displaying, and modifying page sizes.
Fixed a bug with restoring the last view settings on macOS.
Resolved an issue with editing text objects using the Edit Text tool.
Added automatic text recognition functionality.
Added document printing in a Booklet mode.
Implemented support for scaling PDF documents using the touchpad on Apple laptops.
Implemented the ability to rotate objects using a rotation handle located above objects.
Added a page selection feature that allows selecting pages with check boxes in the Navigation panel.
Added the ability to specify coordinates using mathematical operators in the object inspector.
Implemented numerous improvements and fixes to the printing process.
Fixed an issue with printing documents in Landscape and Portrait orientations.
Fixed incorrect display of the application icon on Wayland.
Fixed issues occurring during the export of PDF documents to text format.
Fixed an issue in the object inspector’s functionality.
Fixed a bug causing repeated initial styles on macOS.
Resolved an issue where a file would be overwritten despite selecting “No” in the “Replace File” dialog.
Fixed a bug related to creating a new session when canceling session creation.
Fixed an issue with text recognition on a specific page.
Fixed an issue related to moving a file tab after its update.
Resolved a bug affecting the border color change of the typewriter during editing.
Fixed an issue that caused the reset of bookmark styles and colors defined in their properties.
Fixed a bug that invalidated signatures upon saving a document.
Fixed an issue causing page size changes after converting a document to PDF/A format.
Resolved an issue when extracting pages to a network folder.
Fixed a crash caused by using hotkeys for printing with saved settings.
Improved converting a file format from PDF to PDF/A.
Improved creating and editing bookmarks.
Added the functionality to save custom page size.
Added the functionality to split files by specified page ranges.
Improved the document display when switching between pages.
Fixed issues when creating, opening, and editing documents.
Fixed an issue with the page display on the navigation panel.
Improved the display of some interface elements.
Improved export to the TXT and XLSX file formats.
Fixed issues with adding headers and footers.
Fixed issues with scanning.
Fixed an issue with the increase in document size.
Fixed bugs with duplex and color printing.
Fixed an issue with a signature when deleting a page.
Fixed a bug with activating a program.
Added new functionalities for managing layers.
Added the ability to select the latest settings when printing a new document.
Enhanced compatibility with PDF 1.3 format specification.
Improved settings for the page display and layout.
Improved navigation in a document and between documents.
Fixed an issue with saving a file on macOS.
Improved the display of some interface elements.
Fixed an issue with editing headers and footers.
Fixed a bug with the display of some PDF-files.
Fixed issues with printing and highlighting form fields.
Fixed an issue with adding initials.
Added the ability to insert image files using drag and drop.
Fixed critical issue when minimizing main window of the application.
Multiple minor fixes.
Added Recent files to the main page and main menu
Added Poster and Multipage printing modes
Added customizable Toolbar settings
The program is fully optimized for the latest Linux distributions
Fixed issue with incorrect Initial View
Fixed issue with documents being opened on the wrong page
Fixed issue with ClosePage event
Added SubmitForm event message
Improved file saving speed
Fixed area calculation issues
Fixed issues with File Open dialog (focus loss in Linux)
Fixed file saving issue
Fixed issues with incorrect display of some PDF documents
Fixed bug which initiated infinite recursion when processing color in some documents
Fixed issue with watermarks creating from files
Fixed issue which crashed the application when printing
Improved JavaScript support
Fixed OpenSSL issues in some operating systems
Fixed numerous issues with printing
Other minor bugs fixed
Noticeably improved drag-and-drop for all supported OS and fixed all known issues with it
Fixed several different issues
